overview: Short - Magda's had a rough go of it lately - having just suffered through a miscarriage - but she's always been able to use her sense of humor as a coping mechanism. But now she has to spend the day with her upper-class in-laws, where it would be the height of rudeness to even discuss such matters, let alone joke about them. Will she make it through the day, with her sanity intact?  -  Jonathan Baldock, Don Berns, Morgan Davidoff
title: Love. Marriage. Miscarriage
